page.title: 05SHOPPING 06200219
page.content: {FRINTON} THE TRIANGLE SHOPPING CENTRE IN FRINTON IS WIDELY USED BY LOCAL PEOPLE.WE DECIDED TO GO THERE TO FIND OUT WHAT PEOPLE LIKED ABOUT IT.MOST PEOPLE USE THE GATEWAY SUPERMARKET STORE BECAUSE IT IS VERY BIG.IT HAS ALL THE FOOD THEY WANT AND IT IS A REASONABLE PRICE.THE SHOPPERS SAID THAT THE CENTRE HAS CHANGED A LOT FOR THE BETTER.HERE IS A LIST OF SOME OTHER SHOPS AT THE TRIANGLE: THE BUTCHERS, AN ELECTRONIC SHOP, MARTIN'S NEWSAGENTS, A FRUIT AND VEGETABLE SHOP, A BAKERS, A WOOL SHOP, WHICH ALSO SELLS CLOTHES, COOK'S OFF LICENCE WHICH STARTED UP IN 1885, A PUB CALLED THE GREEN KING, A FURNITURE SHOP, A COMMUNITY CENTRE, A CHEMIST AND TWO DOCTORS. LOCAL PEOPLE WOULD LIKE A SHOE SHOP, BUT GENERALLY THEY ARE PLEASED WITH THE FACILITIES.
